channel.title: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life
channel.description:
I know some people here dislike how powerful the marines were but me and my friends loved it. I mean sure the Xen aliens were pretty tough but they're fighting the military, the best of the best, highly trained professional soldiers. Only reason why gordon wins against them is because hes the main character.
I had always hated how useless the army is in some movies/games so its good to finally see our military kicking some alien butt. Really loved how the marines in black mesa wins most of the battle. To me the Xen aliens weren't even that powerful of a alien race anyway.
I do agree with some people that there should be more xen aliens in the game, especially alien grunts but please don't start making the marine side lose, i would still like to see them kick ass. I hope in the next game Xen, there would be some marine squads invading the alien world, losing some battles but also winning some of course.
Loved Black Mesa as much as the original already, for a free game it beats a lot of 60 dollar games out there. Can't wait for xen!

item.title: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
HECU MARINE:

Mr. Someguy where can I download this hecu skin pack you showed on screenshot with nigtvision googles for hecu etc. ?

The skin is these two with this pack. The pack is outdated, there’s a version with up to 5 skins out now, but that’s the one I was using at the time of that screenshot.

I should clarify that the skin doesn’t have anything to do with whether NVG’s will show up or not. If you want NVG’s on stock BM grunts and don’t want to change anything, then copy the below text into your character_manifest under the npc_human_grunt. If you have anymore questions you can PM me so we don’t derail this.

	npc_human_grunt
	{
		flex_data
		{
			brow_h 1.0
			neck_size 0.75
		}
		bodygroup_data
		{
			gasmask_nv 1
			gloves 0,1
			holster 1
			packs_chest 0,1
			packs_hips 0,1
			packs_thigh 0,1
		}
		model "models/humans/marine.mdl"
		skin 0,2
	}

Read full topic

item.source: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life

item.title: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Yeah, it’s an RPG. The Grenadiers in Black Mesa just have an RPG with 1 shot. They’ll fire it at the first enemy they see, or on scripted sequences, then they’ll take out an MP5, load it, and start shooting.

I do miss the actual grenadiers, it annoys me that everyone has a Grenade Launcher and nobody uses it. I just assume that they used all their Grenades by the time we fight them, or that some of the booms in ST are from GL’s.

Read full topic

item.description:
Still hate that you only see them use the mp5 grenade 2 times. (for the people who don’t know look at the first garg battle and how you lose the tram). It added a sense of fear knowing that that grunt over there could hit you in the face with a explosive if he so dared.

item.description:
I wouldn’t mind it if they just made the soldier AI try to flank you/stay out of your line of sight when possible, and throw grenades more often.

The few times they had thrown nades I loved scrambling to pick it up and throw it back.

item.source: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life

item.title: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
ac3d:

I don’t like how the grunts will run up to the player and stay there while they empty rounds into you, the grunts know that Freeman is armed and dangerous, so they should be hiding and shooting from behind cover whenever they can

Yeah but Gordon dies very easily when you have a whole squad unloading on him at once. Gordon’s advantage is supposed to be his intelligence, singling out targets, or ambushing them, etc. They probably know that the HEV will fail if they put enough fire into it.

Honestly, if the Grunts acted like this in WGH, I’d need a new strategy to deal with them. My current one pretty much plays on the fact that they don’t support each other very well and like to bunch up in doorways whilst ignoring live grenades at their feet.

Read full topic
item.source: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life

item.title: Loved the H.E.C.U Marines in this more than the original half life
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
In BM, the commanders are like just special type of hgrunts that wear different gear but still like an ordinary hgrunts. Theirs really signify that they really are leaders by giving commands by hand signals.

Also I like what they did to the houndeyes. No offense but in BM, they may be in packs but they still act like individuals.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
amazingcomedy:

It may happen. James Kane and some others are interested in releasing the source code. They might as well, Black Mesa can become an even better mod if they did that.

Oh, I thought that was only to certain modders who wanted to make a mod of BM, rather than modify BM. And that was just something I assumed, not something I actually read.

We’d still need OBM’s source code though.
